Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.internal.android

Class AndroidBluetoothDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.internal.android.AndroidBluetoothDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBluetoothDevice
    public final class AndroidBluetoothDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBluetoothDevice
    Default implementation of IBluetoothDevice, and wraps BluetoothDevice. This class is used by default by the library, and the only time it should NOT be used, is when unit testing.
    See Also:
    BleDeviceConfig.bluetoothDeviceFactory
